summary: An ordinance providing for the funding of $3,500,000 outstanding General Fund warrants by the issuance and sale of general negotiable interest bearing serial coupon bonds in said sum; providing for a loan and for the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal; and interest of said bonds; creating a bond interest of said bonds; creating a bond interest and redemption fund, and pledging a specific portion of the permissible property tax levy in connection therewith.
